input.sentences: festivals are a great part of american culture .
these festivals portray unique events in history and revolve around the morals learned from the events .
sometimes the history is sad and dark .
however | the community getting together and commemorating such events is a healthy reminder of where we are and where we 've been .
output.sentences: A group of people dress up in costumes and wear flower hats.
A mob gathers together, carrying pitchforks and masks.
A group of people gather together.
Two guys wear tan full body coverings.
A group of people get their picture taken.
